FuncDef: This command resets the credit for an SLA-profile instance.
CLIs: credit-reset sap <sap-id> subscriber <sub-ident-string> sla-profile <sla-profile-name> { category <category-name> | all-categories } [ spi-sharing-type <spi-sharing-type> ] [ spi-sharing-id <spi-sharing-id> ]
credit-reset sap <sap-id> ip <ip-address> { category <category-name> | all-categories } [ mac <mac-address> ]
credit-reset svc <service-id> ip <ip-address> { category <category-name> | all-categories } [ mac <mac-address> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the physical port identifier portion of the SAP definition.
Resets the credit for the specified subscriber identification, up to 32 characters.
Resets the credit for the specified SLA profile, up to 32 characters.
Resets the credit for the specified category, up to 32 characters.
Resets the credit for sessions with the specified SPI sharing type. Values-per-group, per-session-ipoe, per-session-ppp.
Resets the credit for sessions with the specified SPI sharing type and sharing identifier. The SPI sharing identifier is:. Values-0 to 4294967295.
Resets the credit for the specified IP address.
Resets the credit for the specified MAC IP address.
Resets the credit for the specified subscriber profile, up to 32 characters.

Resets the credit for the specified service ID. Values-service-id:	1 2147483647
svc-name:		 up to 64 characters..
